meanings.definition: The quality or state of being significant.
meanings.sent1: The significancy of her smile brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The significancy of his words resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent3: The significancy of the tiny puppy trying to act tough was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The significancy of the old oak tree in the park symbolized strength and endurance.
meanings.sent5: The significancy of the lighthouse guiding ships through the storm was undeniable.

meanings.definition: The meaning or importance of something.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the significancy of the ancient artifact required careful study.
meanings.sent2: The significancy of friendship lies in the support and joy it brings.
meanings.sent3: The significancy of the lost sock in the laundry was a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The significancy of the first snowfall brought a sense of wonder to the children.
meanings.sent5: The significancy of the rare flower in the garden captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The power to impress or influence.
meanings.sent1: The significancy of his presence commanded attention in the room.
meanings.sent2: The significancy of her performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent3: The significancy of the magician's trick amazed the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The significancy of the leader's speech inspired positive change.
meanings.sent5: The significancy of the artist's brush strokes conveyed deep emotion.
